    • Method Detail

      • addQRCode

        public void addQRCode​(QRCode qrCode,
                      java.lang.String username)
        Adds a QRCode object as a document in the QR code collection within the database
        Parameters:
        qrCode - QRCode to add to database
        username - username of Player who scanned QR code

      • addOnSuccess

        public void addOnSuccess​(java.lang.String name,
                         QRCode qrCode)
        Helper function for addQRCode. Adds the QRCode to database with the name of the QRCode as the key
        Parameters:
        name - name of the QRCode
        qrCode - QRCode object to store on database

      • getQRCode

        public void getQRCode​(java.lang.String name,
                      QRCodeCallback callback)
        Gets a QRCode from the database based on name
        Parameters:
        name - name of the QR code to find in database
        callback - has method containing what to do with queried QRCode

      • getQRCodesByQuery

        public void getQRCodesByQuery​(com.google.firebase.firestore.Query query,
                              QRCodeListCallback callback)
        Get all QR codes that satisfy a given query
        Parameters:
        query - Firebase Firestore query containing results to process
        callback - has method containing what to do with queried list of QRCodes

      • getQRCodesWithCoordinates

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.Query getQRCodesWithCoordinates()
        Query that retrieves all QR codes with coordinates (non-null coordinates field)
        Returns:
        Return the query that retrieves all QR codes with coordinates (non-null coordinates field)

      • getPlayerQRCodes

        public void getPlayerQRCodes​(java.lang.String playerName,
                             QRCodeListCallback callback)
        Get all QR codes that a player has scanned given the player's name
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of Player to find all QR codes scanned
        callback - has method containing what to do with queried list of QRCodes

      • getQRCodeHelper

        public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> getQRCodeHelper​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> comments)
        Helper function for getQRCode that get a list of a QR code's comments
        Parameters:
        comments - An ArrayList to hold comments of a QR code
        Returns:
        Return a list of a QR code's comments

                         java.lang.String username)
        Updates number of players who have scanned a QRCode when a Player deletes a QRCode from their account

        qrCode - QRCode to update in database
